name: Test your knowledge: Dogs
description: Is a test game that will test your knowledge of different breeds of dogs. Do you know what a variety of dog breeds look like? German shepherd, Labrador Retriever, English bulldog, Poodle, Golden Retriever, Chihuahua, and many others.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 150 MB available space
